mapper.insert: insert into `mail` (agentId, context, date, name, status) values (#{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update `mail` set agentId = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, context = #{context,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agentId, context, date, name, status from `mail`
